org.jeo.data

Interface Workspace

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, Disposable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GeoPkgWorkspace, MemWorkspace, MongoWorkspace, OGRWorkspace, PostGISWorkspace, SingleWorkspace

    public interface Workspace
extends Disposable
    A container of Dataset objects.
    Author:
    Justin Deoliveira, OpenGeo

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the workspace.
      VectorDataset create(Schema schema)
      Creates a new vector dataset in the workspace.
      Driver<?> driver()
      The driver used to open the workspace.
      Map<Key<?>,Object> driverOptions()
      The driver options for the workspace.
      Dataset get(String name)
      Returns a dataset object by name.
      Iterable<Handle<Dataset>> list()
      The names of all datasets of the workspace.

    • Method Detail

      • driver

        Driver<?> driver()
        The driver used to open the workspace.

      • driverOptions

        Map<Key<?>,Object> driverOptions()
        The driver options for the workspace.

      • list

        Iterable<Handle<Dataset>> list()
                               throws IOException
        The names of all datasets of the workspace.
        Returns:
        Iterable over datasets.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • get

        Dataset get(String name)
            throws IOException
        Returns a dataset object by name.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the dataset.
        Returns:
        The Dataset object, or null if no such dataset exists.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • create

        VectorDataset create(Schema schema)
                     throws IOException
        Creates a new vector dataset in the workspace.

        This method should throw UnsupportedOperationException if the workspace is not capable of creating new vector datasets.

        Parameters:
        schema - The schema of the vector dataset.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the workspace.

        Application code should always call this method when the workspace is no longer needed.

        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface Disposable
